content:
That's a great idea! Searching online for local jewelry stores in your area can help you find a store that offers custom design services. This way, you can work with a designer to create a pair of earrings that perfectly matches the necklace and your sister's style.

When searching online, you can use keywords like "custom jewelry design," "jewelry stores near me," or "local jewelry designers" to find stores in your area that offer custom design services. You can also check websites like Yelp or Google Maps to read reviews and find highly-rated jewelry stores in your area.

Additionally, you can also ask the store staff about their custom design process, including:

* What types of gemstones they work with
* The metals they use (e.g., silver, gold, platinum)
* The design process and how they work with customers to create a custom piece
* The timeframe for creating a custom piece
* The pricing for custom designs

By asking these questions, you can get a better sense of whether the store is a good fit for creating a custom pair of earrings that matches the necklace.

Good luck with your search, and I hope you find a great store that can help you create a beautiful pair of earrings for your sister's birthday!
